text:
Message 3297 of 4024
I’m not sure how I escalated anything, but we can have the discussion. That’s actually why I to talk. You and I cut through the bullshit. We’ve done
that in the past very successfully. Something that appears to be a big deal may not be a big deal after all.
May I offer this suggestion that will be harmless :
Can we please ask to make one appointment with Dr. Brown that at least tries to help us get back on reasonable and civil terms together. If it doesn’t
work, fine, but let’s please at least try it given she knows us.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:30 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/20/2024 at 05:31 PM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3298 of 4024
Christine, you said you gave away my stuff or at best community stuff that you did unilaterally I didn’t raise my voice. I just asked you to stop.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/20/2024 at 05:31 PM)
Subject:Re: Hangers
Message 3299 of 4024
Did you approve the letter sent by your lawyer? If yes, then there is no argument regarding escalation.
These are not urgent.
I will adhere to Andy’s rules.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:31 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/20/2024 at 05:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3300 of 4024
I did not know we agreed to new terms. Are we going on another thing that that you have just decided without telling me?
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:32 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 05:42 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3301 of 4024
False. Max was a witness. This discussion is over.
Sent:06/20/2024 at 05:32 PM
From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: Hangers
